thread.title: Malone & kelci
thread.title_full: Buddy Allen Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Malone & kelci

author: Malone & kelci
title: Malone & kelci
text: We LOVE our new floors! They are so much better then the dark ones we previously had, they showed everything! With the expert advice and guidance that Buddy Allen Carpets One gave us they helped us choose this floor.
